casebody.data:
KASLER
v.
BRIDGES. No. 520P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. David J. Adinolfi, II, Assistant Attorney General, for State. William L. Hill, Greensboro, for Kevin Bridges, et al. Terry M. Sholar, for City of Monroe.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of September 2005 by Plaintiff for "Petition to Certify the Cause for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
